titles.title: Let The Words Of My Mouth Be Thanksgiving

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the words of my mouth be thanksgiving,
Let the voicing of my heart be praise.
Let each thought of my mind be set on you Lord.
Let my life be a worship unto you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That thou might lead me on,
More fully on Thy highway.
Lead me on unto Thee.
That with each step I take,
The old man is left behind,
And newness of life is coming forth.
